name: Ball Jointed Doll (BJD)
description:
BJD

Please be gentle - I'm not sure what I'm doing. But these came out surprisingly well.

Trained from 75 images I took with my DSLR of a ball-jointed doll I bought a few years ago. I think I built this correctly, but it's my first attempt so I may have screwed things up. I used RevAnimated1.1 as the basis for this, but that does not seem to affect the output much.

It is hard to post images from this because Civitai's illegal content detector believes that dolls can be underaged, or something.
